title: Manage Horizontal Transport Fleet
description: A dispatcher for terminal tractors (ITVs) must efficiently assign jobs to move containers from the ship to the yard.

tasks.description: Monitor the queue of containers being discharged by the quay cranes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatcher sees a queue of containers waiting for pickup at the quayside.

tasks.description: Identify available terminal tractors and their current locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatcher sees three available tractors near the vessel.

tasks.description: Assign the next container move to the closest available tractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system sends a job ticket to the tractor driver's terminal, instructing them which container to pick up and where to take it.
